column5: so this is the  second day of my vacation , went fishing the first day ,so the second day I sell my baby my nitro my fishing boat my bass boat....now what the heck am I going to do for 3 weeks  really sad to see some other guy drive away with her......good bye old friend       so well waiting for the guy to show up I put this together for misfish        <object width="425" height="350"> <param name="movie" value="
A Canadian without a boat is like a yank without a gun "danger zone". ??? If you can wax boat and motors there should be some spots open?
Now why'd ya go and do that Terry?  I'm gonna miss the sturgeon slayer  Joey
Very cool vid bud and thank you.  You know yer always welcome on my boat when you need to feel the wind rush through yer beard.LOL

When does the new boat arrive?  I can't believe for a second that  you sold your boat......and don't have another one on the way??  And on your vacation to boot.....are you OK....  If your interested in getting out on sturgeon for an evening during the week while your boatless, just shoot me a message and we can work something out.  Sinker
